content.question: The development of Black Studies and African American Studies is most closely related to

choices.label: the popularity of the Universal Negro Improvement Association of the 1920s
the success of the March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom during the 1940s
the founding of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference in the 1950s
the growth of the Black Campus movement in the 1960s and 1970s

content.answer: the growth of the Black Campus movement in the 1960s and 1970s

skill.text: 1.D: Explain how course concepts, developments, and processes relate to the discipline of African American Studies.
